# Module: tf.python_io

## Classes

[`class TFRecordCompressionType`](../tf/io/TFRecordCompressionType): The type of compression for the record.

[`class TFRecordOptions`](../tf/io/TFRecordOptions): Options used for manipulating TFRecord files.
